bestial: BestialYou act on primal, physical impulses. Frightening things make you run. You meet aggressive threats with violence and anger. Take a -2 penalty to all rolls to resist these impulses. As well, take a -2 penalty to Defense due to your impulsive actions. Any rolls to compel your character to impulsive, aggressive action or escape achieve exceptional success on three successes instead of five.Resolution: Cause damage in someone's last three Health boxes.
informed: InformedYou have a breadth of research information based on the topic investigated. When you make a roll relating to the topic, you may choose to resolve this Condition. If you resolve it and the roll fails, consider it to have a single success instead. If it succeeds, consider it an exceptional success. The roll that benefits from the Informed Condition can be any relevant Skill roll. For example, a character with Informed (Werewolves) might gain its benefits when using researched information to build a silver bear trap with the Crafts Skill. Combat rolls cannot benefit from this Condition.Resolution: Your character uses {{his}} research to gain information; you resolve the Condition as described above.
shaken: ShakenSomething has severely frightened you. Any time you are taking an action where that fear might hinder you, you may opt to fail the roll and resolve this Condition.Resolution: You give in to your fear and fail a roll as described above.

How you respond to this is up to you, but it captivates you and dominates your focus.Resolution: This Condition is resolved when your fear and fascination causes you to do something that hinders the group or complicates things (you go off alone to investigate a strange noise, stay up all night researching, run away instead of holding your ground, etc.).
